title: #FYI For Tribunal Judges From Judge Ananda Bosman - Report — Truckers & Free Speech
cleaned_text:
I had completed a complete report with the very latest leading edge combination on things.

I completed a highly polished send out Freedom Report, with much more extensive coverage of the Tribunal, mRNA vaccines with links, and a plethora of intricate interrelated themes.

As it was being sent at around 3 am, the sending process started to lock. Then Apple Mail crashed, and the complete report vanished. Only a much earlier version of the report, short of 7-8 hours of further work on it remained. I enclose below.

I will take this Aikido style, and gather more pertinent news is up ahead, to be included, in reshaping and retracing some of the work of tonight.

Good work with the press release, and the Writs and Orders.

A 45 Day Trucker Commission has begun on October 13th. The rules were designed by Trudeau, who announced this Commission in April. The setup has every appearance of being an inside job, rigged towards the truckers movement being guilty, and justifying freezing accounts, and utter violation of Canadian rights, according to the Charter of Rights and Freedoms, and Bill of Rights etc.

Overview of Day 1 from the truckercommission.com:

50 lawyers for the government, Trudeau, the City of Ottawa, Ottawa police etc., verses 4 lawyers for the truckers. 50 to 4!!! Some other lawyers present representing the people, like the JCCF:

The 45 days of cross examinations, may have elements of the US January 6th Committee, and the Alex Jones Trials, charging Jones 1 billion USD (“more coming” close to 8 billion), for showing footage that questions the main MsM narrative, including footage from CNN.

Now Jones has to pay for every problem that the families of Sandyhook have undergone after the loss of their children, which had nothing to do with Jones.

DAY TWO OF THE TRUCKERS COMMISSION

Now it begins to get nasty, this is a pure setup, and crucifiction of the Freedom Movement — Police Officer who Donated 55 bucks to the Freedom Convoy, Pleads Guilty:

Graphene implants that had grown in abductees, where identified in the early 1990s, by Dr Darel Simms, which could give a time traveling component to this operation.

HYPER-MORPHOGENIC FIELD: THE PRESENCE OF THE FUTURE — PROPOSITION BY ANANDA BOSMAN
